description: Fr. Mike Schmitz is joined by renowned Catholic Bible scholar Jeff Cavins, to talk about The Great Adventure Bible Timeline, their personal experiences with the Bible, and what it means to live life through the lens of Scripture.  Learn more and get the reading plan at ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear or text CATHOLICBIBLE to 33-777.  Get your copy of The Great Adventure Catholic Bible (https://bit.ly/3mmal7w)!
html_description:
Fr. Mike Schmitz is joined by renowned Catholic Bible scholar Jeff Cavins, to talk about The Great Adventure Bible Timeline, their personal experiences with the Bible, and what it means to live life through the lens of Scripture.


Learn more and get the reading plan at ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear or text CATHOLICBIBLE to 33-777.


Get your copy of The Great Adventure Catholic Bible!

Support The Bible in a Year (with Fr. Mike Schmitz)
name: BONUS: Catholics and the Bible (with Jeff Cavins) 2023
